# `polars selector all` for [expression](/commands/categories/expression.md)

<div class='command-title'>Creates a selector that selects all columns.</div>

## Signature

```> polars selector all {flags} ```


## Input/output types:

| input | output          |
| ----- | --------------- |
| any   | polars_selector |
## Examples

Create a selector for all columns
```nu
> polars selector all

```

Multiply all columns by 2 using with-column
```nu
> [[a b]; [1 2] [3 4]]
                    | polars into-df
                    | polars with-column ((polars selector all) * 2)
                    | polars collect
╭───┬───┬───╮
│ # │ a │ b │
├───┼───┼───┤
│ 0 │ 2 │ 4 │
│ 1 │ 6 │ 8 │
╰───┴───┴───╯

```
